title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4105.1 - Appointment of officials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4105.1 - Appointment of officials

State Regulations
(a) The
executive director of the commission shall appoint the following State
officials to act at race meetings: the presiding judge, associate judges, inspectors, recording judges, starters, patrol judges, paddock judges, stress
coordinators who counsel licensees on behalf of the commission regarding
alcohol and drug abuse, State veterinarians, and such other State officials as
may be needed to act as the commission's representatives at the race
meeting. (b) The racing
associations and corporations shall employ and appoint the following
association racing officials and their assistants: race secretaries, program
directors, announcers, marshals, timers, photo finish operators, track
superintendents, and photo patrol operators. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4105.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
